name: Edge of Death - Vimlark Jam 2021 Entry
name_original: Edge of Death - Vimlark Jam 2021 Entry
description:
Enemies will steal HEAT from your NEOFLAME BACKPACK

Losing heat causes your GUN to go into OVERDRIVE

When you run out of heat you are on the EDGE OF DEATH

STEAL back your heat or succumb to the cold

Controls:

WASD to Move

Mouse to Aim

Left Click to Shoot
